testcase.name: Oracle_login_test.As_a_user_I_can_log_into_the_secure_area
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given Open oracle's login page✅ When Enter username and password of "validlogin"✅ Then Check the account is logged in✅ Then Reload session

testcase.name: Oracle_login_test.As_a_user_I_can_log_into_the_secure_area
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given Open oracle's login page✅ When Enter username and password of "invalidlogin"✅ Then Check the error message
